topics.body:
Ughhhh. . . . christ. . politics

I'm going to summarize the current news in a nutshell:
Democrats lost control of the senate because of disillusionment with the government and all Obama really did to help Democrats was offer lipservice to them during the election.  Basically they lost cause "thanks obama".

Well it's been three days and republicans have already managed to shit the bed.  Republicans in congress believes it was a "republican revolution" and has gone full idiot mode and are now going further extremist.  Now they're bringing back trying to repeal the ACA and other stuff.

Democrats lost the elections because Obama did nothing to help them and people massively disapproved of congress, but Republicans went idiot and now believes there's a conservative revolution happening and are now back to their old shit and don't realize that they're fucking up their 2016 run.

Tl:dr; of Tl:dr; Democrats and Republicans have gone full retard.
topics.author: 38b55cdf63616403d7560600

topics.body:
Hey guys, I'm back for this day only and I just wanted to say about the ending for Naruto.

[spoiler]Apparently, the last chapter shows that Naruto marries Hinata, Sakura marries Sasuke, Temari marries Shikamaru, Ino marries Sai, Choji marries some black chick, the world has gone all modern, Naruto is the 7th Hokage, Sasuke is still alive, Lee has a son who I have no idea who his mother is, Naruto has a son with the worst name ever, Naruto regrew a limb, everything is peaceful and stuff and finally, Sakura's daughter likes Naruto's son. Oh and also, the Ninja world now has Internet.[/spoiler]

Welp, now to get back to studying. I just went through 4 subjects and I'm still keeping it cool (I have six more to go).

[spoiler]I suck at religious studies.[/spoiler]
